description: This file contains the styles for a simple to-do list application, including variables for theming and various styles for components such as the to-do item, input bar, and layout adjustments.

classes.name: .todo-app-container
classes.description: Container for the entire to-do application, providing layout and styling for proper display.

classes.name: .todo-title
classes.description: Styling for the title of the to-do application.

classes.name: .todo-count
classes.description: Displays the count of items in the to-do list.

classes.name: .todo-input-bar
classes.description: Input area for users to add new to-do items.

classes.name: .todo-list
classes.description: Styling for the list of to-do items.

classes.name: .todo-item
classes.description: Styling for each individual to-do item in the list.

classes.name: .todo-checkbox
classes.description: Checkbox for marking to-do items as complete.

classes.name: .todo-delete-btn
classes.description: Button for deleting a to-do item.
